messages.message:
The field-editor test is failing in CI because it's trying to run an app and it's hitting this error: `Error from execute_step:write_summary_results, error:Error while writing summary results, err=All records had a runtime exception, last error observed: Exception occured while running step s3 apply_classifier: Spend limit exceeded.` @Victor Zeng is this a new metronome thing? Why would be seeing this on this environment and not some others?

Also, kudos to @Paul H for adding logs, made it so easy to debug this!!!

It was reported here as well.
We should've been using the commercial context but somehow the context is lost during the execution so we ended up using the community context. Spend limit only applies to community users
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1729102385243909?thread_ts=1729035855.216129&cid=CSY11CK7T
This seems like a pretty consequential bug, no?
Yea, it's definitely a critical one.
I don’t remember adding logs! Perhaps it’s someone else’s kudos :thinking_face:
